about_the_game:
The demo of Watashi Suzume is now available on Steam, and has been expanded to include more content!
Players can now experience the opening three chapters of our debut project for free!
We hope that this demo gives players a grasp on the type of story we would like to tell, while also leaving them wanting more.
Will you help unravel the mystery of what's going on in this sleepy sea-side town?
Give the demo a try and see if our debut title is a good fit for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4.
  • Graphics: gtx 860, Radeon 560
  • Sound Card: yes
